required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Change of Intramedullar Pressure After Implantation of Hip Prothesis
clinical_study.official_title: DIfference of Femoral Intramedullar Pressure After Implantation of Cemented Versus Non-cemented Femoral Component of Hip Prothesis

brief_summary.textblock: It is well known that the changes in intramedullary canal during orthopedic surgeries can cause variuos complication. The change of femoral intramedullary pressure after implantation of hip replacement and its possible complications are not well studied and the investigators are aiming to give more answer to this issue.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of pressure in femoral intramedullary canal after implantation of femoral component
primary_outcome.time_frame: The femoral intramedullary pressure will be measured before the cut of femoral neck and continuously during first 10 minutes after the implantation of cemented femoral component
primary_outcome.description: The pressure in intramedullary canal will be measured with customized device

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of arterial pressure after implantation of femoral component
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The changes will be measured before implantation and during first 10 minutes after implantation
secondary_outcome.description: The changes will be measured by the device monitor connected to patient

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of changes of Leukocyte formula after implantation of femoral component
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The blood will be taken from patience 1 hour before and POD1
secondary_outcome.description: The changes will be measured from the blood taken from operated patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of SpO2 after implantation of femoral component
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The changes will be measured before implantation and during first 10 minutes after implantation
secondary_outcome.description: The changes will be measured by the device monitor connected to patient

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of SpCO after implantation of femoral component
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The changes will be measured before implantation and during first 10 minutes after implantation
secondary_outcome.description: The changes will be measured by the device monitor connected to patient

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of changes of CRP after implantation of femoral component
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The blood will be taken from patience 1 hour before and POD1
secondary_outcome.description: The changes will be measured from the blood taken from operated patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of changes of Histamine after implantation of femoral component
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The blood will be taken from patience 1 hour before and POD1
secondary_outcome.description: The changes will be measured from the blood taken from operated patients

arm_group.arm_group_label: Hip replacement with cemented femoral component
arm_group.description: A special device that measure the pressure will be used to measure the change of pressure before, during and after implantation of cemented femoral component of hip prothesis.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Hip replacement with non-cemented femoral component
arm_group.description: A special device that measure the pressure will be used to measure the change of pressure before, during and after implantation of non-cemented femoral component of hip prothesis.

intervention.description: The hip replacement surgery is when a damaged hip is replaced with artificial one
intervention.arm_group_label: Hip replacement with cemented femoral component
Hip replacement with non-cemented femoral component

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient undergoing hip replacement with cemented and non-cemented femoral component
Exclusion Criteria:
- ASA IV
- Patient with periprosthetic fractures
- Patient with hip replacement revision
